sent.orig: Crash a container-truck and part of a guardrail is simulated with the help of software PAM-CRASH.
sent.trans: 采用PAM-CRASH软件，模拟集装箱汽车列车与桥梁护栏的碰撞过程。

sent.orig: Michael Porter forewarned of a dot-com crash a long time before the crash occurred.
sent.trans: 在千禧年网路泡沫化发生前很长一段时间，麦可．波特就曾对此预先发出警告。

sent.orig: Crash Troubleshooter-steps you through what can cause a crash and tells how to fix it.
sent.trans: 坠毁疑难问题-步骤，您通过什麽可以导致崩溃，并告诉如何解决此问题。

sent.orig: Crash Course takes its name from the fact that it begins with a helicopter crash.
sent.trans: 速成班的名字，是因为它一开始就直升机坠毁事件。

sent.orig: Rubeus Hagrid: A car crash? A car crash killed Lily and James Potter?
sent.trans: 鲁伯·海格：车祸？车祸哪能伤得了莉莉和詹姆波特？
